humanPowered.title: Egoless
humanPowered.text: Willing to do the schlep, the team goals come first.

humanPowered.title: Process Driven
humanPowered.text: Engineer yourself out of the job.

benefits.title: Fully Remote
benefits.text: We hire globally. We believe you can do your best work from anywhere. There are no Supabase offices, but we provide a co-working membership that you can use anywhere in the world.

benefits.title: Hardware Budget
benefits.text: Use this budget for anything you need to set up your work environment from tech to office setup.

benefits.title: Health Benefits
benefits.text: We provide 100% health coverage for employees and 80% for dependants. It's important to us that you & your family have health care covered.

benefits.title: Annual Off-Sites
benefits.text: We believe in the value of in-person time, so we all come together annually for a week. Each year we pick somewhere different in the world. It's a highlight of the year!

benefits.title: Flexible Work
benefits.text: Work remotely from anywhere in the world. We work in teams, but we work asynchronously. You know what you need to do and when it needs to be done.

benefits.title: Professional Development
benefits.text: An annual allowance to spend on professional development and education. Use this for courses, books, conferences, or anything that supports your continuous learning.

hiring.title: Recruiter Interview
hiring.text: Chat with our recruiter to tell us about your career journey, professional goals and we'll share more about Supabase, the role & our recruitment process.

hiring.title: Technical / Skill-based Interview
hiring.text: Meet with the team lead. In this interview we'll aim to learn about your hard skills and problem solving approach.

hiring.title: Another Technical / Skill-based Interview
hiring.text: You'll either meet the department lead or peer. This interview will dive deeper into your hard skills and our expectations for this role.

hiring.title: Final Founders Interview
hiring.text: Our co-founders meet every candidate as the final step. Learn more about Supabase's values, mission and vision directly from them.
